availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander T. White (Manchester, Clay County, Farmer, Representative)

body.p: Manchester, Clay County, Kentucky, farmer and representative. Clay County, Kentucky native. Married to Ellen J. White. Father of Sally A. White, Hugh A. White, Catherine White. Farmer in Clay County in 1860. Representative of Manchester, Clay County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Find A Grave, "Alexander T. White (April 24, 1830-September 14, 1870)," Memorial #78299542, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/78299542 (accessed December 07, 2018).
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clay County, Manchester, p.7.
Kentucky Digital Newspaper Program, "The Daily Commonwealth, 1863-01-30." https://kentuckynewspapers.org/catalog/xt7n8p5v7w3d (accessed December 07, 2018)
